text: Amy Charity (born November 25, 1976) is an American professional racing cyclist. She rode for the Optum-Kelly Benefit Strategies team. She raced in the 2015 UCI Road World Championships. ==Major results== ;2013 * 1st Tour de Park City * 1st Colorado Road Race State Championships ;2014 * 2nd UCI Tour de Feminin, Stage 5 * 4th UCI Tour de Feminin-O cenu Českého Švýcarska, General Classification ;2015 * 1st National Team Time Trial ==See also== * List of 2015 UCI Women's Teams and riders ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:American female cyclists Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Amy Charity
